text: Abe is a common Japanese surname. It can be written as 阿部, 安倍, or 安部 etc. Notable people with this name are listed below. ==Politicians== * Shinzō Abe * Shintaro Abe * Nobuyuki Abe - general in the Imperial Japanese Army ==Footballers== *Yuki Abe *Hiroki Abe *Teruo Abe *Hiroyuki Abe *Kazuki Abe *Bunichiro Abe *Yutaro Abe ==Writers== *Kōbō Abe Category:Japanese-language surnames
title: Abe (surname)
